author: MSNBC.com
title: Trump pursues harmful agenda amid global pandemic
description: While the Trump administration claims to be focused on the crisis at hand, they have also been using the last month to pursue all kinds of ideological and policy vendettas.

title: Captain of aircraft carrier begs Navy for help as 93 sailors test positive for COVID-19
